column4: My gutsy gibbon experience so far: xorg and mga is broken, no 1680x1050 on Dell 2007WFP. Gcc installed, but not-working due to missing libc-dev. Azureus is broken.
azureus is ok but id recommend ktorrent or deluge or any number of non java clients. ati.. yeah thats still a problem often
Azureus is NOT ok. It crashes out-of-the-box.
Also, mga (matrox) not ATi. Prior version on debian worked just fine.
